Title: Update DMS Indexdaten aus topteam Daten
Content:
Aktualisiert alle Indexdaten  in DW anhand der Daten aus topteam.

-- =============================================
-- Author: Stefan Bätz, topfact AG
-- Create date: 21.01.2016
-- Description: Update DMS data from topteam
-- =============================================
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[Sync_DMS_Indexdata]
AS
BEGIN

SET NOCOUNT ON;

UPDATE
t1
SET
t1.COMPANY = t2.Company,
t1.CONTRACT_CATEGORIE = t2.ContractCategorie,
t1.ERPID = t2.ERPID,
t1.CRMID = t2.CRMID,
t1.[OWNER] = t2.ContractOwner,
t1.OWNER_EMAIL = t2.ContractOwnerEmail,
--t1.TICONTRACT_ID = t2.TIContractNumber,
t1.CONTRACT_STATUS = t2.Status,
t1.DEPARTMENT = t2.Department,
t1.SUBJECT_ = SUBSTRING(t2.[Subject],0,255),
t1.COMPANY_SPECIFICATION = t2.Companyspecification
FROM 
dwdata.dbo.TRANSPOREON AS t1
INNER JOIN topteam.dbo.StampService_Scandata AS t2 ON t1.Vorgang = t2.ContractNumber
WHERE
t2.DateModified IS NOT NULL AND
t2.DateModified > GETDATE()-3;

END
GO
